directions: Place ice into a cocktail shaker. Pour in vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and lychee juice. Cover and shake vigorously until the outside of the cocktail shaker has frosted.
Strain into a chilled martini glass; garnish with a lychee fruit.
ingredients: 1 ounce lychee juice (from a can of lychees)
title: Lychee Martini
